MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH55 postcode area of West Calder. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.15pm to faulty equipment at 103 Chapelton Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:15pm on Thursday 26th November 2020.
